issue.title: [CF 1058] Notification - Target Marking
issue.body:
I have this Icon setup for Branded on Imperator Mar'gok

http://wow.curseforge.com/addons/tellmewhen/forum/raid/73437-highmaul-imperator-margok-arcane-wrath-branded-track/#p2

and I am wondering how I would go to setup an advanced notification to take the current target of the debuff and put a Raid Marker on them.


> Posted by CurseForge user InfernalAura | Imported from CurseForge issue #1058 | Raw

comments.body:
I like this for a new notification handler. In the mean time, you can add a Lua notification handler, and add this to the code after the "your code goes here" line:

SetRaidTarget(icon.attributes.unit, 8)

Change the number 8 if desired, as follows:

  • 0 - Clear any raid target markers
  • 1 - Star
  • 2 - Circle
  • 3 - Diamond
  • 4 - Triangle
  • 5 - Moon
  • 6 - Square
  • 7 - Cross
  • 8 - Skull
Edited Jan 5, 2015

> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras

Just out of curiosity is there somewhere in the docs where I can see what is part of that Icon variable in the Lua Notification.

Before asking this question I did check the pages and the Icon page but there was alot of function so I was wondering if I missed something.


> Posted by CurseForge user InfernalAura

Unfortunately not. You can use LuaBrowser to look at them though - icon is the actual frame that is the icon. They're named TellMeWhen_Group1_Icon1 or TellMeWhen_GlobalGroup1_Icon1.


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras
